title: Sony's Xperia XZ2 Premium is finally being released in the UK
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * When it launches, the Xperia XZ2 Premium will run Android 8.0 with Sony’sfairly inoffensive skin on top. Thankfully we won’t have to wait too long forit to be updated to [Android 9Pie](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/android-pie), as that has beenconfirmed for a November roll-out.**Related:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-android-phones-3438996)**Obviously having a 4K screen on a phone is a feature to shout about, butwhether it actually makes a difference remains to be seen. At least there’splenty of content that you’ll be able to watch on it. Both Amazon Prime Videoand YouTube support 4K HDR content here, while Netflix will display in HDRwith 4K support coming later.When it becomes available on August 31, the Sony Xperia XZ2 Premium will cost£799. That puts it right in line with competitors like the [Samsung GalaxyS9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s9) and [iPhone8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/iphone-8). It’ll be sold throughAmazon, along with EE.**Do you want a phone with a 4K display? Let us know @TrustedReviews**
